subtitle: These 'Catherine wheels' are great fun for bonfire night.

method.text: Carefully unroll and thread each sausage in a zig-zag pattern onto wooden skewers. Or alternately roll up tightly into a Catherine wheel and thread onto the skewers.
In a pan, heat together the redcurrant jelly, brown sauce, herbs and seasoning for 2-3 min or until melted and well mixed. Brush over the sausages.
Grill for 10-15 min, turning over halfway through until thoroughly cooked. Serve immediately.

title: Saucy cumberland whirls
